content: anni howard www ravelry com/designers/anni-howard preppie scarf with a is w t ty n i g r e f size 158 cm 62 ins long including fringes by 15 cm 6 ins wide the scarf in the photo was knitted materials in rowan tapestry dk - but try a 4 x 50g balls of rowan tapestry in shade 175 fingering or 4ply yarn for a thinner approx 480 m shorter scarf for girls 2 x 4½ mm needles or one 4½ mm circular or a sportweight or aran yarn needle for a winter outdoorsy scarf note this pattern is worked sideways casting anni x on along the long edge you may find it easier to use a circular needle due to the large number of sts page 1 gauge 19 sts and 48 row to 10 cm 4 ins measured over patt using 4½ mm needles preppie scarf using 4½ mm needles cast on 270 sts commence patt row 1 knit row 2 p to end cast on 30 sts by knitting between last 2 sts on left hand needle cable cast on 300 sts row 3 cast off 30 sts loosely knitwise k to end 270 sts these 3 row form patt repeat these 3 row 23 times more there should be 12 tassels at each end cast off knitwise sew in ends block or press lightly to gain measurements stated the twist in the fringe happens when you work your cast off sts looser than your cable cast on tip - have a look on youtube to see the cable cast on technique being worked abbreviations cm centimetres in s inch es k knit p purl patt pattern repeat repeat st s stitch es photocopying of this pattern and knitting this pattern for profit are prohibited design of garments pattern instructions and photographs all © anni howard august 2010 page 2
